    • Facture

      public Facture(String description, Client client, Chef chef)
      Constructs a bill with the specified description, client, and chef.
      Parameters:
      description - the description of the bill
      client - the client for whom the bill is intended
      chef - the chef responsible for cooking the dishes of the bill

    • ajoutePlat

      public void ajoutePlat(PlatChoisi p) throws FactureException, PlatException
      Adds a dish to the bill.
      Parameters:
      p - The dish to add.
      Throws:
      FactureException - if the bill is closed or paid, or if there is no chef or if the dish is null.
      PlatException - if the dish is null.
